capability.name: Compliance Reporting
capability.definition: This service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to apply and report on internal audit control and reporting activity
capability.role: This service domain schedules, consolidates information and reports on internal audit and compliance activity across the bank
capability.example: The financial accounting procedures for a back office function are audited

key_features.name: Consolidate internal compliance/audit reporting materials and assemble reports
key_features.description: Enables consolidate internal compliance/audit reporting materials and assemble reports to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to apply and report on internal audit control and reporting activity

key_features.name: Delivery scheduled and ad-hoc reports to internal auditors, highlighting non-compliance
key_features.description: Enables delivery scheduled and ad-hoc reports to internal auditors, highlighting non-compliance to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to apply and report on internal audit control and reporting activity

key_features.name: Handle follow up for identified remedial actions for non-compliance
key_features.description: Enables handle follow up for identified remedial actions for non-compliance to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to apply and report on internal audit control and reporting activity

key_features.name: Oversee on-line/production transaction regulatory reporting
key_features.description: Enables oversee on-line/production transaction regulatory reporting to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to apply and report on internal audit control and reporting activity
